item.title: Range-Agnostic Multi-View Depth Estimation With Keyframe Selection
item.author: Author
item.description: Andrea Conti &middot Matteo Poggi &middot Valerio Cambareri &middot Stefano Mattoccia [Paper] [Code] [Demo] Overview Multi-View 3D reconstruction techniques process a set of source views and a reference view to yield an estimated depth map for the latter. Unluckily, state-of-the-art frameworks require to know a priori the depth range of the scene, in order to sample a set of depth hypotheses and build a meaningful cost volume. do not take into account the keyframes selection.
